title: BRIEF-Truworths International Announces Conclusion Of UK Debt Restructuring
text:
BRIEF-Truworths International Announces Conclusion Of UK Debt Restructuring

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 26, 2019 16:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Truworths International Announces Conclusion Of UK Debt Restructuring Sept 26 (Reuters) - Truworths International Ltd : * JSE: TRU - SUCCESSFUL CONCLUSION OF UK DEBT RESTRUCTURING * TRUWORTHS INTERNATIONAL - SUCCESSFULLY CONCLUDED DEAL WITH PRINCIPAL SOUTH AFRICAN BANKERS, STANDARD BANK, TO PROVIDE STERLING DENOMINATED FUNDING * TRUWORTHS INTERNATIONAL LTD - FUNDING HAS BEEN OBTAINED ON FAVOURABLE COMMERCIAL TERMS ON UK DEBT RESTRUCTURING * TRUWORTHS INTERNATIONAL - FUNDING OF GBP32.5 MILLION USED TO SETTLE OFFICE BUSINESS' EXISTING STERLING DENOMINATED DEBT OF GBP43 MILLION * TRUWORTHS INTERNATIONAL LTD - MANAGEMENT CONTINUES WITH IMPLEMENTATION OF TURNAROUND

BRIEF-Truworths International Announces Conclusion Of UK Debt Restructuring
